participant_1.background:
I am afraid of not being able to control my diabetes.
I value my freedom and my time to do what I want.
I sometimes get too caught up in my own head and don't listen to my partner.
my grandma raised me.
i spend as much time as i can with my family.

participant_2.background:
I love learning about animals and nature, but my cooking skills are lacking.
Social media is not my thing.
I keep my home so clean that it's almost a museum.
my hair is as red as the sunset.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

content.text: Howdy
Howdy, how is your day going?
Good! Just got back from a long vacation to Florida. I got to see Taylor Swift in concert there. She was great!
Oh wow! That must have been so much fun! I love Taylor Swift. I wish I could go to one of her concerts.
It was! I hope you get to go to one one day. What did you do on your vacation?
I stayed at home and read a lot. I love learning about animals and nature so I read a lot of books about them.
That sounds like fun! I love animals too. I have a dog and a cat.
Oh that's so cute! What are their names?
My dog's name is Buddy and my cat's name is Mittens.
Those are adorable names!
Thanks! I like them too.
So what else do you like to do for fun?
I like to spend time with my family and friends. I also like to go to the movies and play video games.
I love going to the movies too! I also like to go shopping and play board games with my friends.
Oh nice! I love board games too! I like to play Monopoly and Scrabble.
Those are some of my favorite games too! I also like to play Clue and Monopoly Deal.
Those are fun games too! I'm glad we have similar interests.
Me too! I'm sure we'd have a lot of fun hanging out together.
I think so too! We should definitely get together sometime soon.
That would be fun! Let's exchange numbers and make plans.
